topic.title: 회의 및 협업
topic.description: 업무 환경에서 자주 사용되는 회의 진행과 팀 협업 표현들을 학습합니다.

korean_scripts.korean_text: 오늘 오후 3시에 중요한 프로젝트 회의가 있습니다.
지난주에 우리가 논의했던 마케팅 전략에 대해 다시 검토해야 합니다.
각 팀원들이 준비한 자료를 발표할 예정이며, 특히 예산 배분과 일정 관리가 핵심 이슈가 될 것 같습니다.
만약 모든 부서가 협력한다면, 이번 프로젝트는 성공적으로 완료될 수 있을 것입니다.
하지만 예상치 못한 문제가 발생할 가능성도 있으므로, 백업 계획을 미리 준비해 두는 것이 좋겠습니다.
회의 후에는 결정된 사항들을 문서로 정리하여 모든 관련자에게 공유할 계획입니다.
다음주까지 각자의 역할과 책임을 명확히 하고, 첫 번째 중간 점검을 실시하겠습니다.

english_scripts.english_text: We have an important project meeting at 3 PM today.
english_scripts.chunked_text: We have | an important project meeting | at 3 PM today.

english_scripts.english_text: We need to review the marketing strategy that we discussed last week.
english_scripts.chunked_text: We need to review | the marketing strategy | that we discussed last week.

english_scripts.english_text: Each team member will present the materials they've prepared, and budget allocation and schedule management will likely be the key issues.
english_scripts.chunked_text: Each team member | will present the materials | they've prepared, | and budget allocation | and schedule management | will likely be | the key issues.

english_scripts.english_text: If all departments cooperate, this project can be completed successfully.
english_scripts.chunked_text: If all departments | cooperate, | this project can be | completed successfully.

english_scripts.english_text: However, there's also a possibility that unexpected problems might occur, so it would be good to prepare backup plans in advance.
english_scripts.chunked_text: However, | there's also a possibility | that unexpected problems | might occur, | so it would be good to | prepare backup plans | in advance.

english_scripts.english_text: After the meeting, we plan to organize the decided matters into documents and share them with all stakeholders.
english_scripts.chunked_text: After the meeting, | we plan to organize | the decided matters | into documents | and share them | with all stakeholders.

english_scripts.english_text: By next week, we'll clarify each person's role and responsibilities, and conduct the first interim review.
english_scripts.chunked_text: By next week, | we'll clarify | each person's role | and responsibilities, | and conduct | the first interim review.

keyword_speeches.target_sentence: We have an important project meeting at 3 PM today.
We need to review the marketing strategy that we discussed last week.
Each team member will present the materials they've prepared, and budget allocation and schedule management will likely be the key issues.
If all departments cooperate, this project can be completed successfully.
However, there's also a possibility that unexpected problems might occur, so it would be good to prepare backup plans in advance.
After the meeting, we plan to organize the decided matters into documents and share them with all stakeholders.
By next week, we'll clarify each person's role and responsibilities, and conduct the first interim review.

learning_points.english_phrase: clarify each person's role and responsibilities
